ygData.subject: Re: New Record
ygData.msgSnippet: well just Saturday night while juggling a marguerita and the keyboard while running down from HH pass I left the ridge and fell to my death at 10000 points of
ygData.messageBody:
well just Saturday night while juggling a marguerita and the keyboard while
running down from HH pass I left the ridge and fell to my death at 10000
points of damage.....

BUT I didn't drop the Marguerita!



----------
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Record
> Date: Sunday, September 12, 1999 6:47 PM
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> no this is for running with selo's. i think all 10000dmg falls (other
than
> obviously killing anyone) are bugs, such as falling through a hole in the
> earth, like i did in upper guk once. plus this is my own personal record
of
> basically just running from one point to another, not going out of my way
to
> jump off a cliff or wizard gate or anything like that.
>
> Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
> Erisi Dlarit, Level 22 High Elf Paladin
> Tyria, Level 16 High Elf Wizard
> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> > From: Valharick@...
> >
> > In a message dated 9/12/99 2:14:44 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
> > Michael.Garramone@... writes:
> >
> > << 561 dmg off cliff in south ro coming innnothule to oasis,
> > second cliff out
> > from oasis zone. >>
> > Is this a new record for falling and living? Or jsut total
> > damage? If your
> > going total damage I've had 10k done :) need less to say i
> > didnt survive....
> >
> >
> > Renaldo Rallentando of the 26th string
